name: bismuth
title: Bismuth
author: trikop, cackling fiend
description:
Intended to be played with all BZ mods. And also in the SEK2BZ combo for a very so called fun experience.
Made to incorporate itself into a lot of recipes

Most code is a modified version of the code in Brevven's mods (the BZ mods) It's quite useful as a base for making a mod I'd say :D

Most of the graphics is placeholderish, will have to do something about that xD
